transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON JOHN HOWARD MP
transcript.content:
E&OE..................

All over Australia, all over the world today, our countrymen and women are

gathering - drawn together almost by instinct, by a great silent summons to repay

a debt to the past. Each year the numbers of us grow. Each year, more and more

young Australians hear the call, though far removed, in time and circumstance, from

those they seek to honour.
